fields.name: Carrot Soup
fields.ingredients: Carrots, Onions, Potatoes, Garlic, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Peel and chop the carrots, onions, and potatoes.
Heat a large pot with some olive oil.
Add the onions and garlic, sauté until soft.
Add the chopped carrots and potatoes to the pot.
Add water to cover the vegetables and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and let it simmer until the vegetables are soft.
Use an immersion blender to blend the soup until smooth.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with a garnish of fresh herbs.
Enjoy your warm and comforting carrot soup.

fields.name: Maple Syrup Pancakes
fields.ingredients: Maple Syrup, Flour, Eggs, Milk, Butter, Baking Powder, Salt
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, and melted butter.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients.
Stir until smooth.
Heat a pan and lightly grease with butter.
Pour batter onto the pan to form small circles.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip to cook the other side.
Repeat for all pancakes.
Serve the pancakes with maple syrup on top.
Enjoy your sweet and fluffy breakfast!

fields.name: Wild Blueberry Jam
fields.ingredients: Wild Blueberries, Sugar, Lemon Juice, Pectin
instructions: In a large pot, combine wild blueberries and sugar.
Heat the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Add lemon juice and pectin.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer.
Let the jam simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring frequently.
Test the consistency by placing a small spoonful on a cold plate.
Once thickened, remove from heat.
Pour the jam into sterilized jars while still hot.
Seal the jars and let them cool.
Store the jam in a cool, dark place and enjoy later!

fields.name: Lobster Roll
fields.ingredients: Lobster, Mayonnaise, Celery, Lemon, Hot Dog Buns, Butter
instructions: Boil the lobster in salted water until cooked.
Remove the meat from the shell and chop into bite-sized pieces.
In a bowl, mix lobster meat with mayonnaise, chopped celery, and lemon juice.
Toast the hot dog buns with butter in a pan until golden brown.
Fill the buns with the lobster mixture.
Garnish with extra lemon wedges.
Serve the lobster rolls immediately.
Enjoy the fresh and flavorful lobster rolls!

fields.name: Tomato Salad
fields.ingredients: Tomatoes, Olive Oil, Salt, Pepper, Basil
instructions: Wash and chop the tomatoes.
In a bowl, toss the chopped tomatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Add fresh basil leaves for extra flavor.
Stir the ingredients to combine.
Serve in a bowl and drizzle with more olive oil if desired.
Garnish with extra basil.
Enjoy your refreshing tomato salad!

fields.name: Cabbage Stir-Fry
fields.ingredients: Cabbage, Soy Sauce, Garlic, Ginger, Olive Oil, Sesame Seeds
instructions: Slice the cabbage into thin strips.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté until fragrant.
Add the cabbage and stir-fry until tender.
Pour soy sauce over the cabbage and continue stir-frying.
Garnish with sesame seeds for a nice crunch.
Serve hot and enjoy your delicious cabbage stir-fry!

fields.name: Chanterelle Mushroom Risotto
fields.ingredients: Chanterelle Mushrooms, Arborio Rice, Vegetable Broth, Parmesan, White Wine, Butter
instructions: Sauté the chanterelle mushrooms in butter until golden.
In a separate pot, cook the arborio rice with vegetable broth.
Once the rice is cooked, stir in the sautéed mushrooms.
Add white wine and let it reduce.
Stir in parmesan cheese until melted.
Continue stirring until the risotto reaches a creamy consistency.
Serve the risotto with extra parmesan on top.
Garnish with herbs if desired.
Enjoy this rich and creamy mushroom risotto!

fields.name: Corn on the Cob
instructions: Boil or grill the corn until fully cooked.
Brush the corn with melted butter.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the corn hot.
Enjoy the simple, delicious taste of corn on the cob!
